医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究强调了支持照顾者在优化儿童行为结果方面的重要性根据美国国立卫生研究院环境对儿童健康结果影响 (ECHO) 项目资助的一项研究，在 COVID-19 大流行期间，为护理人员提供的情感支持和切实援助使所有家庭受益，而不仅仅是那些面临较高压力的家庭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Study-highlights-the-importance-of-support-for-caregivers-in-optimizing-child-behavior-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Study-highlights-the-importance-of-support-for-caregivers-in-optimizing-child-behavior-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=785ef4a1-8f29-4f08-bdd8-bc2ee0839053 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 14:15:19 -0400 Study highlights the importance of support for caregivers in optimizing child behavior outcomes
美国国立卫生研究院拨款支持凯斯勒基金会的科学家推进忽视阅读障碍和自闭症的研究凯斯勒基金会的三名研究科学家，即 Timothy Rich 博士、OTR/L 以及联合首席研究员 Helen Genova 博士和 Heba Elsayed 医学博士，已获得美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 授予的 777,325 美元联邦拨款，用于扩大研究范围在忽视阅读障碍和自闭症领域.0 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/NIH-grants-support-Kessler-Foundation-researchers-to-advance-research-on-neglect-dyslexia-and-autism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/NIH-grants-support-Kessler-Foundation-researchers-to-advance-research-on-neglect-dyslexia-and-autism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0c71ecd-4c5b-4b74-aa3e-32aef49d3361 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 14:06:00 -0400 NIH grants support Kessler Foundation scientists to advance research on neglect dyslexia and autism
巴克研究所获得 350 万美元联邦拨款，用于领导老年人酮干预的临床试验巴克衰老研究所获得了 350 万美元的联邦拨款，用于领导首次双盲、随机、安慰剂对照临床试验，以了解补充酮酯对虚弱的影响，虚弱是一种随年龄增长而出现的脆弱状况多个生理系统的相关衰退。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Buck-Institute-receives-2435-million-federal-grant-to-lead-clinical-trial-of-ketone-intervention-in-older-adults。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Buck-Institute-receives-2435-million-federal-grant-to-lead-clinical-trial-of-ketone-intervention-in-older-adults。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd5e6b3d-0998-415e-bb1f-31b9ea872064 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 13:57:10 -0400 Buck Institute receives $3.5 million federal grant to lead clinical trial of ketone intervention in older adults
缓刑不成比例地影响美国黑人的健康结果“不要相信所有有强烈惩罚冲动的人，”弗里德里希·尼采一个多世纪前警告说。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Probation-disproportionately-affects-the-health-outcomes-of-Black-Americans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Probation-disproportionately-affects-the-health-outcomes-of-Black-Americans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6765d0fc-f539-4025-9102-8305b52fbfc2 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 13:44:18 -0400 Probation disproportionately affects the health outcomes of Black Americans
兴趣爱好可以保护老年人免受与年龄相关的心理健康和幸福感下降伦敦大学学院 (UCL) 领导的一项新研究表明，对于 65 岁及以上的人来说，拥有一项爱好可以减少抑郁症状，提高幸福感、自我报告的健康水平和生活满意度，这一点在三大洲 16 个国家都是如此。伦敦大学）研究人员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Hobbies-protect-older-people-from-age-lated-decline-in-mental-health-and-wellbeing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Hobbies-protect-older-people-from-age-lated-decline-in-mental-health-and-wellbeing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60719422-1756-4e77-9c1a-709b69100ede Mon, 11 Sep 2023 13:38:23 -0400 Hobbies protect older people from age-related decline in mental health and wellbeing
城市生活与幼儿呼吸道感染风险增加有关根据在意大利米兰举行的欧洲呼吸学会国际大会上发表的研究，在城镇和城市长大的幼儿比在农村长大的幼儿更容易遭受呼吸道感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Urban-living-linked-to-increased-risk-of-respiratory-infections-in-young-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Urban-living-linked-to-increased-risk-of-respiratory-infections-in-young-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=265fa054-ee60-49fd-b94a-646a5eda7be0 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 13:26:15 -0400 Urban living linked to increased risk of respiratory infections in young children
使用 CPAP 可以降低睡眠呼吸暂停患者因心血管疾病死亡的风险根据在意大利米兰举行的欧洲呼吸学会国际大会上发表的研究，患有阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停 (OSA) 的人如果在夜间使用持续气道正压通气 (CPAP) 机，可以降低死于心血管疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/CPAP-use-reduces-risk-of-death-from-cardioangio-disease-in-sleep-apnea-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/CPAP-use-reduces-risk-of-death-from-cardioangio-disease-in-sleep-apnea-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94b897b0-5b04-4210-adcc-5de6c9e596f8 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 13:22:15 -0400 CPAP use reduces risk of death from cardiovascular disease in sleep apnea patients
婴儿早期成熟的肠道微生物群可以预防喘息和过敏根据在意大利米兰举行的欧洲呼吸学会国际大会上发表的研究，肠道中存在更成熟细菌群落的婴儿和幼儿患过敏相关喘息或哮喘的可能性较小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Mature-gut-microbiota-in-early-infancy-may-protect-against-wheezing-and-allergies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Mature-gut-microbiota-in-early-infancy-may-protect-against-wheezing-and-allergies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29f4e987-8732-493d-a56f-d6bb84e4f96c Mon, 11 Sep 2023 13:20:38 -0400 Mature gut microbiota in early infancy may protect against wheezing and allergies
CheckMate 227 试验：Nivolumab + ipilimumab 在转移性 NSCLC 中显示出显着的六年生存获益2023 年在新加坡举行的国际肺癌研究协会 (IASLC) 世界肺癌大会将见证转移性非小细胞肺癌 (NSCLC) 治疗领域的重大突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/CheckMate-227-Trial-Nivolumab-2b-ipilimumab-shows-remarkable-six-year-survival-benefits-in-metastatic-NSCLC.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/CheckMate-227-Trial-Nivolumab-2b-ipilimumab-shows-remarkable-six-year-survival-benefits-in-metastatic-NSCLC.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30d9aa80-9336-477c-86d8-7d2650ec686f Mon, 11 Sep 2023 12:59:46 -0400 CheckMate 227 trial: Nivolumab + ipilimumab shows remarkable six-year survival benefits in metastatic NSCLC
发现低分子量人白细胞介素 1β 拮抗剂研究人员描述了一种低分子量的人白细胞介素 1β 拮抗剂的检测，该拮抗剂会破坏与白细胞介素 1 受体 I 型受体的相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Low-molecular-weight- human-interleukin-1ceb2-antagonist-discovered.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Low-molecular-weight- human-interleukin-1ceb2-antagonist-discovered.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35406ace-5abb-40a7-a3e3-83cecab42d9f Mon, 11 Sep 2023 11:44:00 -0400 Low-molecular weight human interleukin-1β antagonist discovered
